About Trulia | News Room | Trulia Blog | Careers | Privacy | Terms of Use | Subscription Terms of Use | Community Guidelines This Single-Family Home located at 5 Norwood Pl, Bella Vista AR, 72714 is currently for sale and has been listed on Trulia for 146 days. This property is listed by EXIT Pro Realty for $169,900. 5 Norwood Pl has 3 beds, 2 baths, and approximately 1,551 square feet. The property was built in 2005. 5 Norwood Pl is in Bella Vista and in ZIP Code 72714 . The list price of $169,900 is 2% lower than the average list price of $172,872 for 72714 real estate and 8% lower than the average list price of $184,562 for Bella Vista, AR real estate . The price for this property is 40% higher than the average sales price of $121,500 for 72714 and 43% higher than the average sales price of $118,540 for Bella Vista. The price per square foot for this property is $110, which is 71% higher than the average of $64 for 72714, and 61% higher than the average of $68 for Bella Vista. Copyright©2012 Trulia, Inc.
